Summary: This document provides instructions for registering for the NUS Guest WIFI. Once successfully authenticated, the connection is valid for 24 hours. To access the Classroom PCs, EEP participants can use the provided credentials to login to the ISS Desktop PC. The process involves connecting to the NUS_Guest SSID, entering a mobile number, receiving an OTP, and agreeing to the Terms of Use. The OTP must then be entered to confirm the registration.
